document_data.name: Moirene Trimapule
document_data.mainbody: irene had long white-blonde hair, loosely tied back, gray eyes, and light skin.
document_data.Description: Moirene had long white-blonde hair, loosely tied back, gray eyes, and light skin.
document_data.History: During the mid-1480s DR, Moirene watched from her home as [[Purple Dragons]] escorted people, [[Sharran]] or otherwise, to [[Wheloon Prison]].
